required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nebulized Resveratrol Plus Carboxymethyl-β-Glucan for Reducing IL-5 in Children With Allergic Rhinitis
clinical_study.official_title: ReNIM Study - Nebulized Resveratrol Plus Carboxymethyl-β-Glucan for Reducing Nasal Interleukin-5 (IL-5) Measurements in Children With Allergic Rhinitis

lead_sponsor.agency: Istituto di Biomedicina e Immunologia Molecolare Alberto Monroy

clinical_study.source: Istituto di Biomedicina e Immunologia Molecolare Alberto Monroy

brief_summary.textblock:
Single-center, randomized, placebo-controlled study to investigate the effect of Resveratrol plus Carboxymethyl-β-Glucan, two sprays (100µL/spray) for nostril three times/day for 4 weeks, in comparison with placebo, in reducing nasal interleukin-5 (IL-5) in children with Allergic Rhinitis (AR).
Secondary objectives are to examine the effect of resveratrol plus carboxymethyl-β-glucan, in comparison with placebo, on subjective parameters, i.e. symptom scores, visual analogue scales for rhinitis, quality of life and quality of sleep, and the effect on objective parameters, i.e. nasal nitric oxide (nNO) levels, nasal cytology and acoustic rhinometry.

primary_outcome.description: Mean change in IL-5 level from baseline to the end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.description: Mean change in T5SS score from baseline to the end of treatment.
Mean change in VAS score from baseline to the end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Paediatric Rhinoconjunctivitis Quality of Life Questionnaire (PRQLQ)
secondary_outcome.description: Mean change in PRQLQ score from baseline to the end of treatment.
Mean change in PSQI score from baseline to the end of treatment.
Mean change of nNO from baseline to the end of treatment.
Mean change in nasal cytology counts from baseline to the end of treatment.
Mean change of MCA from baseline to the end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Acoustic Rhinometry: Nasal Volume from the first 5 cm from the nostril (V.0-5)
secondary_outcome.description: Mean change of V.0-5 from baseline to the end of treatment.

intervention.description: Patients in this arm will receive Resveratrol plus Carboxymethyl-β-Glucan, two sprays (100µL/spray) per nostril three times/day for 4 weeks
Patients in this arm will receive nasal saline solution 0.9%, two sprays per nostril, three times/day for 4 weeks

facility.name: Institute of Biomedicine and Molecular Immunology (IBIM) - National Research Council of Palermo

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Istituto di Biomedicina e Immunologia Molecolare Alberto Monroy
responsible_party.investigator_title: Ph.D. Senior Researcher. Coordinator of Pediatric Allergy and Asthma Research Group. Institute of Biomedicine and Molecular Immunology, IBIM, National Research Council of Palermo, Italy.
